mapper.select: select * from TB_BLOCK where blocker_id = #{id} limit ${pageNum} , 10
mapper.delete: delete from TB_BLOCK where blocking_id = #{blocking_id} and blocker_id = #{blocker_id}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_BLOCK (blocker_id, blocking_id, block_date) values (#{blocker_id}, #{blocking_id}, now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from TB_BLOCK a where exists(select * from TB_BLOCK b where b.blocking_id = #{blocking_id} and b.blocker_id = #{blocker_id})

select count(*) from TB_BLOCK a where exists(select * from TB_BLOCK where (blocker_id = #{blocker_id} and blocking_id = #{blocking_id}) or (blocker_id = #{blocking_id} and blocking_id = #{blocker_id});)
